title: Pbe wont let me create an accout but i got accepted Help!
body: Well I got accepted into the pbe testing recently and evertime I try to create an account it tells me Application received and it wont let me get to the create an account section.

replies.body:
Can you confirm the email mentioned PBE and not the Alpha Client? There has been a wave going out to invite players into the Alpha Client, which is a completely different thing than the PBE. The Alpha client is the new client that allows you to test the client that will eventually replace the one everyone uses at the moment. It doesn't allow you to enter the test environment (PBE) to try new balance changes, game modes or new champs.

Check out our [Alpha Client FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/206201070-Alpha-Client-FAQ) for complete details. Let me know if you have any other questions.
it is and there wasnt a link in the email only a download
There should be a button/link "Create your PBE account". Please insure the email came from Leagueoflegends@email.riotgames.com

how to be accepted to the pbe?
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
Make sure you are logging in with the same account that was accepted, and use the link from the email.
